Name: Lesser Enhancement Stone
Desc: A mysterious Enhancement Stone that improves equipment.

Name: Normal Enhancement Stone
Desc: A mysterious Enhancement Stone that improves equipment.

Name: Advanced Enhancement Stone
Desc: A mysterious Enhancement Stone that improves equipment.

Name: Superior Enhancement Stone
Desc: A mysterious Enhancement Stone that improves equipment.

Name: Rusty Spring
Desc: A spring used to push the breech block forth. Rusty on the surface due to lack of maintenance. Used for Exclusive Weapon Growth.

Name: Intact Spring
Desc: A spring used to push the breech block forth. As good as new. Used for Exclusive Weapon Growth.

Name: Chromium Spring
Desc: A spring used to push the breech block forth. Made of chromium alloy which makes it durable and rust-resistant. Used for Exclusive Weapon Growth.

Name: Titanium Spring
Desc: A spring used to push the breech block forth. Made of titanium alloy which makes it even more durable while staying light. Used for Exclusive Weapon Growth.

Name: Rusty Hammer
Desc: A part of the gun that delivers the power from trigger to the firing pin. Rusty on the surface due to lack of maintenance. Used for Exclusive Weapon Growth.

Name: Intact Hammer
Desc: A part of the gun that delivers the power from trigger to the firing pin. As good as new. Used for Exclusive Weapon Growth.

Name: Chromium Hammer
Desc: The part of a firearm that transmits force to the firing pin when the trigger is pulled. It is made of chromium alloy, so it's sturdy and rust-resistant. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Titanium Hammer
Desc: The part of a firearm that transmits force to the firing pin when the trigger is pulled. It is made of titanium alloy, so it's lighter and stronger. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Rusty Barrel
Desc: The steel tube in a firearm through which a bullet is fired. It hasn't been maintained, so it's covered with rust. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Intact Barrel
Desc: The steel tube in a firearm through which a bullet is fired. It is well-preserved and in pristine condition. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Chromium Barrel
Desc: The steel tube in a firearm through which a bullet is fired. It is made of chromium alloy, so it's sturdy and rust-resistant. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Titanium Barrel
Desc: The steel tube in a firearm through which a bullet is fired. It is made of titanium alloy, so it's lighter and stronger. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Rusty Firing Pin
Desc: The metal rod that strikes and triggers the primer of a bullet. It hasn't been maintained, so it's covered with rust. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Intact Firing Pin
Desc: The metal rod that strikes and triggers the primer of a bullet. It is well-preserved and in pristine condition. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Chromium Firing Pin
Desc: The metal rod that strikes and triggers the primer of a bullet. It is made of chromium alloy, so it's sturdy and rust-resistant. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Titanium Firing Pin
Desc: A metal rod that strikes and triggers the primer of a bullet. It is made of titanium alloy, so it's lighter and stronger. Used to enhance unique weapons.

Name: Plain Baseball Cap
Desc: A navy blue plain cap released by the sportswear brand Serval. Various badges can be attached to it to show off your individuality and make a fashion statement.

Name: Knitted Wool Hat
Desc: A knitted wool hat made for high school girls by the outdoor brand Manaslu. Although it doesn't provide much warmth, it's popular for its cute design.

Name: Big Brother Fedora
Desc: A fedora with a small plush of the Momo Friends character Big Brother, dangling from it. It's said that you can feel Big Brother watching you when you wear this hat.

Name: Ribbon Beret
Desc: A beret with a white ribbon used as a school hat at Trinity General School. According to those who've worn it, it's rather difficult to keep the beret's voluminous shape intact while wearing it.

Name: Bulletproof Helmet
Desc: A rugged bulletproof helmet to protect your head from all sorts of flying projectiles. The exterior can be decorated with all sorts of patches.

Name: Frilly Mini Hat
Desc: A mini hat decorated with colorful frills. A small hairpin is hidden under the brim to hold the hat in place.

Name: Bucket Hat
Desc: A large bucket hat that hides the upper part of the face. When combined with a mask, it minimizes exposure of the face and provides excellent UV protection.

Name: Sports Gloves
Desc: Gloves with a rugged outer lining to prevent your hands from slipping. They have been coated in a flame retardant material, so even a hot gun barrel will feel cool to the touch.

Name: Knitted Mittens
Desc: Mittens made for high school girls by the outdoor brand Manaslu. Although they don't provide much warmth, they're popular for their cute design.

Name: Peroro Oven Mitts
Desc: White oven mitts made with an image of Peroro, the mascot of Momo Friends. Rumor has it that wearing these will suddenly make you want to do a weird dance.

Name: Leather Gloves
Desc: Gloves made using high-quality leather fabric. Because they're not very durable, they're mainly used for ceremonial purposes.

Name: Tactical Gloves
Desc: Rugged tactical gloves made from flame-retardant material. There's no risk of getting burnt from an overheated gun barrel with these!

Name: Lace Gloves
Desc: Luxuriously designed gloves made of satin. Be careful when handling fire as they're sensitive to heat.

Name: Arm Covers
Desc: Arm covers for students who seek both UV protection and fashion at the same time. Recommended for the changing seasons.

Name: Pink Sneakers
Desc: Pink sneakers released by the sportswear brand Serval. They're suitable for running, thanks to the soft material used in the soles.

Name: Shearling Boots
Desc: Cold weather boots from the outdoor brand Manaslu. Their cute design and excellent thermal insulation make them popular with high school girls in cold regions.

Name: Pinky-Paca Slippers
Desc: Slippers made with the image of Pinky-Paca, the pink alpaca from Momo Friends. Soft and well-insulated.

Name: Antique Enamel Loafers
Desc: High-quality shoes worn by the students of Trinity General School. With an enamel paint finish, these shoes shine in the light.

Name: Tactical Boots
Desc: Heavy and rugged tactical boots for protecting your feet. Their thick soles also have the added benefit of increasing your height, making them a popular choice for shorter students.

Name: Heeled Pumps
Desc: High heels with cute ankle straps. They add elegance and sophistication to every step.

Name: Casual Sneakers
Desc: Sneakers with a simple design. Lightweight and well-fitting, they are favored by many students.

Name: Waterproof Sports Bag
Desc: A waterproof sports bag made by Serval. Safe to take into the river or ocean.

Name: Insulated Messenger Bag
Desc: A messenger bag for cold weather made by Manaslu. Its thick lining keeps lunch boxes and drinks warm.

Name: Peroro Backpack
Desc: A backpack with a giant Peroro print. It's quite roomy and very popular, even among those who aren't Peroro fans.

Name: Dark Blue School Bag
Desc: A dark blue school bag made in adherence to the rules of Trinity General School. Also popular with students from other academies thanks to its simple and luxurious design.

Name: Tactical Satchel
Desc: A special Kazeyama satchel with enhanced functionality and storage. A popular choice among students who carry a lot of secondary weapons.

Name: Devil Wing Tote Bag
Desc: A tote bag with large devil wings. Goes well with any casual attire thanks to its simple design.

Name: Street Bag
Desc: This street bag combines a casual atmosphere with practicality. It is a favorite of many students because of its ample storage capacity.

Name: Serval Metal Badge
Desc: A metal badge printed with the logo of the famous sportswear brand Serval. Made of strong metal, there's no need to worry about scratches.

Name: Manaslu Felt Badge
Desc: A felt badge with the logo of Manaslu, an outdoor brand. Made of soft felt, it goes well with cold weather products.

Name: Angry Adelie Button
Desc: A round badge featuring Angry Adelie from Momo Friends. If you stare at it for a long time, you'll feel aggravated somehow...

Name: Veronica Embroidered Badge
Desc: A badge with the logo of the luxury brand Veronica embroidered onto it. It looks luxurious on any product, no matter where you place it.

Name: Kazeyama Patch
Desc: A patch printed with the logo of military specialty brand Kazeyama. The velcro on the back makes it easy to attach and remove from clothing.

Name: Coco Devil Silver Badge
Desc: A silver badge imprinted with the logo of the gothic brand, Coco Devil. It can be worn like a brooch by using the safety pin on the back.

Name: Street Badge
Desc: A new badge from the street fashion brand Triple Step. The boldness of the company name printed large in the center suggests the confidence of the creator.

Name: Tennis Headband
Desc: A tennis headband from Serval, a sportswear brand. It's made of a powerful moisture-absorbing material to handle sweating during exercise.

Name: Scrunchie
Desc: A scrunchie made of a satin material with good elasticity. Make sure to tie your hair up with this scrunchie when eating hot soup!

Name: Momo Hairpin
Desc: A hairpin with Momo Talk's peach-shaped icon. Rubbing the peach gives off a subtle peach scent.

Name: Winged Hairpin
Desc: A hairpin with angel wings made by the luxury brand Veronica. Ironically, it's not very popular with Trinity students.

Name: Multi-Purpose Hairpin
Desc: A hairpin with a sharp end that can be used for a variety of purposes, including as a bottle opener or pocketknife. Just remember not to run your fingers through your hair on accident!

Name: Bat Hairpin
Desc: A bat-shaped hairpin resembling a black ribbon. Whoever wears it takes on the charm of a devilish troublemaker.

Name: Calligraphy Hairpin
Desc: A hairpin designed with letters. The string of letters itself has no meaning, but the design is somehow exciting.

Name: Traffic Safety Amulet
Desc: An amulet made to promote traffic safety. When you shake it, you can hear something metal rattling inside.

Name: Heat Pack
Desc: A palm-sized heat pack that radiates warmth when you rub it a few times and shake it. There is no amulet more useful than this in a frigid environment.

Name: Peroro Feather
Desc: An amulet made with large, white feathers. The source of the feathers is one of Momo Friends' most important trade secrets.

Name: Cross
Desc: A cross-shaped amulet favored by Trinity students. It also works well as an accessory to hang on a bag.

Name: Camo Daruma
Desc: A camo-patterned Daruma plush. Blends in perfectly with all surroundings.

Name: Voodoo Doll
Desc: A cursed doll that seems to be filled with strong emotions such as grudges. It seems to be easy to use as a needlestick, and is very popular among the students of the handicraft club.

Name: Waterproof Digital Watch
Desc: A digital watch produced by the sportswear brand Serval. Because it's waterproof, there is no need to fear ruining it, even if you wear it while swimming.

Name: Leather Wristwatch
Desc: A leather wristwatch made by the outdoor brand Manaslu. A warm lining prevents your wrist from getting cold.

Name: Wavecat Wristwatch
Desc: A wristwatch featuring Wavecat, the cat character from Momo Friends. Wavecat's arms, which act as the clock hands, are twisted in a bizarre way.

Name: Antique Pocket Watch
Desc: An antique pocket watch with the Veronica logo engraved on it. It's far less convenient to check the time with than a wristwatch, but remains popular as a fashion item.

Name: Dustproof Leather Wristwatch
Desc: A wristwatch from the military specialty brand Kazeyama. Its enhanced resistance to dust means you don't have to worry about it breaking down in harsh environments.

Name: Gothic Wristwatch
Desc: A wristwatch designed in a gothic style. Although it looks good with classical clothes, it's difficult to read the time from if you are not accustomed to it.

Name: Bluetooth Necklace
Desc: A Bluetooth necklace that can measure the wearer's body temperature and heart rate. Because it can easily and accurately measure the rate of exercise, it's popular with those who are trying to lose weight.

Name: Snowflake Pendant
Desc: A silver pendant with a snowflake ornament on it. If you stare at the snowflake decoration for a long time, you'll start to feel a bit chilly.

Name: Nicholai Locket
Desc: A locket bearing the face of Mr. Nicholai, a character from Momo Friends. A small space for storing photos opens when you press on his nose.

Name: Cross Choker
Desc: A choker with a cross from the luxury brand Veronica. It's popular for its simple yet sophisticated style.

Name: Dog Tag
Desc: A dog tag inscribed with the name and class year of the student wearing it. It has recently gained popularity as an accessory among high school girls.

Name: Punk Choker
Desc: A punk-style choker with sharp spikes. Wearing it around your neck makes it a little harder to nod your head.
